summary: This mod add new sword to game :)
descriptionHtml:
==================
DESCRIPTION
==================
This mod add new sword Alakris to game
Alakris was created by witches , who want to be immortal. 
But once upon a time a great hero named Zelan killed witches and took Alakris away.

You can craft Alakris in forge:
2 Corundum Ingots
5 Leather Stripes

==============
INSTALLATION
==============
Put in Data folder

===============
UNINSTALLATION
===============
Delete 
Data/Alakris.esp
Data/meshes/weapons/alakris
Data/textures/weapons/alakris
author: Den987
